content: New Case: Orphan school Vocational Training Program Opening for Especially Female Students Recently, I got a request for an Orphanage School where orphan children are getting an education, and the school is working on providing them Vocational training program, especially for Female students. To set up the whole program school is in need of 3500 - 4000k USD in total for a single school. Upon its success, they will be opening another school in a different city. About me:Most of the people know me here I have been around here since 2014 and have been working as a bounty manager since 2016. I have been trusted by many people and my clients trusted me with their bounty tokens/ BTC/ ETH and I have never broken their trust and even returned them cents after distributions. Also, I have many other dealings here which always went smoothly which can be seen in my feedback. I have also given loans with 0% interest just to help needy ones here too.Please step forward for our fellow Pakistanis, Our brothers and sisters who need us in this hard time. Looking forward to seeing your generous donations. We will send these donations to Buy Shelter, food, and medicine for the people affected by the floods.ETH, BSC, MATIC: 0x95524F50582e3aa262182ccb36c6dBd1b4916BcA  | Block ScanBTC; bc1quf48csvsmw0wxc96srwgx533j9ter7jgarlfl6 | Blockchain ExplorerIf you have any questions, doubts, or suggestions please post them here, So I can attend them.  Total raised so far:BNB: 3.099905ETH: USDT: 210.5BTC: 0.252Matic: 15Remaining:BNB: 0.0999ETH: 0USDT: 118.5BTC: 0.002Matic: 15PKR: 384Donators:1. irfan_pak10 - 03 BNB2. comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.created_time: August 26, 2022, 08:45:20 PMLast edit: October 19, 2023, 08:08:11 PM by irfan_pak10
comments.body: Previous Case #1: Fundraising for the Floods disaster in PakistanBackground. It has been 3 months now since heavy Rainfall has flooded the various cities in four provinces of Pakistan. The media has reported more than 100 cities affected and caused a large number of causalities. The unexpected floods have left many families homeless and they are miserably living under the open sky waiting for some aid from all of us. Those millions of affected people have lost their houses, agricultural crops, and animals. Now, these people are in very miserable conditions, living without shelter, thousands of them displaced and having no food to eat and no medicines to fight disease.Disaster Description:As reported in media worldwide, the Pakistani nation is passing through a very difficult time in its history, heavy monsoon rainfall and consequent floods have badly affected 2-3 Million since June 22, destroying at least 100 thousand houses and damaging around 200,000 or more. Sind & Baluchistan are the most affected provinces in terms of humans and infrastructure. Only in Baluchistan were more than 500,000 livestock killed, 3000KM of road destroyed completely & 129 bridges damaged. Nation Disaster Management Authority is working with humanitarian agencies to support and provide necessary aid to affected families. The Thar district of Sind is also affected by these heavy rainfalls. The vast majority of people in this district where most people live in Bush houses have been complexly destroyed and affecters are living in the open sky and waiting for some aid to rehabilitate them. https://reliefweb.int/disaster/fl-2022-000254-pakhttps://www.ndtv.com/topic/pakistan-flood[/s]Humanitarian Gesture from BTT Members:Now I as would like to raise funds from the Bitcointalk community to provide shelter materials, food, and medicines to these people through my trusted friends to as many people as much I can. As you know I have already launched one campaign for the COVID-affected people [I still have some leftover funds in that campaign, will use them here.] and provided food to needy people around me. I am very confident that our community will come forward with this donation campaign and donate whatever it can for this noble cause.NDTV.com (https://www.ndtv.com/topic/pakistan-flood)Pakistan Flood: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Pakistan Flood - NDTV.COMFind Pakistan Flood Latest News, Videos & Pictures on Pakistan Flood and see the latest updates, news, and information from NDTVAlso, you can view the latest with these hashtags on Twitter: #Nowshera #Kalam #Quetta #ڈوب_رہا_ہے_پنجاب Withdraw Amount for flood-affected people: BNB: 3.02 - 03 BNB Converted @274.8usd = 824.1 total = Converted to PKR @217 Exchange rate for 178829 PKR. ETH: 0USDT: 92 - 92+10 USD added from my pocket. = 102 USD total = Converted to PKR @217 Exchange rate for 22134 PKR. BTC: 0.252 - 0.25 Converted @19805 USD = 4951.25 USD total = Converted to PKR @217 Exchange rate for 1074421.25 PKR. Matic: 0Total Distributed to Flood affected people:  1275384.25/1275000 PKR @Current rate 217 per USD Proofs of Distribution: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1YhLKvpcWwiS5454bm4gQeRJrxuNQoR29XGU__CEoSJg/edit?usp=sharing

comments.author: WatChe
comments.body: A much required thread. Pakistan is facing biggest flood in its 75 years of history. Millions are homeless and need immediate attention. Locals are doing there best to help the flood affected people. Since crypto community is global, everyone is requested to please donate. Even your one dollar matters.

The Thar district of Sind is also affected by these heavy rainfalls. Looking forward to seeing your generous donations. We will send these donations to Buy Shelter, food, and medicine for the people affected by the floods.ETH, BSC, MATIC: 0x95524F50582e3aa262182ccb36c6dBd1b4916BcABTC; bc1quf48csvsmw0wxc96srwgx533j9ter7jgarlfl6If you have any questions, doubts, or suggestions please post them here, So I can attend them.  Total raised so far:BNB: 3 ETH: USDT: BTC: Donators:1. irfan_pak10 - 03 BNB 2. 3. They really need our help at this point in time to mitigate their predicament. I will try in my own little way to help out. I encourage everyone  to also try and reach out to them.

comments.body: Everyone pray for Pakistan, and support from your place. Kindness is the best form of humanity, now Pakistani status not good for Floods disaster. Do donations for Pakistani Floods disaster and invite for donation your friend, brother, family and others,

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Its crazy to see what has happened with the flash floods in Pakistan. People are losingtheir lives and their homes. I cannot imagine myself, my family and my neighbours beingforced to live on a boat after losing everything.I hope irfan_pak10 that this thread gains a bit of momentum and maybe others can donate a small portion of their weekly rewards to your efforts. If a lot of people give a little they can make a big difference.

comments.author: MusaPk
comments.body: Really appreciate effort of Irfan sb for taking this initiative. It's a great way for people living in other parts of world to see the miseries of people and help them. If this thread gets success then every reputed member can open a thread if he see anyone in need of help around him. Please step forward and help the people.

comments.author: ThemePen
comments.body: We have lost 1k people. And many are missing. See the report.https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-62699886Watch current situation in these two videos.https://youtu.be/PiX3-RXZALUhttps://youtu.be/gdVgaOdV5xMSee some recent pictures here.https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/interactive/2022/pakistan-floods-monsoon-climate-change/https://www.hindustantimes.com/world-news/33-million-affected-982-dead-6-8-lakh-houses-destroyed-as-pak-battles-floods-101661585451336-amp.htmlMany are there. We are in critical situation now.Pray for Pakistan. Thanks

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on August 28, 2022, 12:20:15 PMWe have lost 1k people. And many are missing. See the report.https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-62699886Watch current situation in these two videos.https://youtu.be/PiX3-RXZALUhttps://youtu.be/gdVgaOdV5xMI don't feel the tears fall when I see the suffering of our brothers and sisters who are being hit by natural disasters.Floods that hit Pakistan have caused material and non-material losses, casualties have also fallen, the difficulty of clean water which can cause health problems for children and the elderly due to the spread of disease outbreaks.The sinking of settlements due to flooding that is quite large can paralyze the activities of local residents, they also have difficulty accessing transportation and carrying out activities as usual which makes the wheels of the community's economy completely paralyzed.Donations collected for the flood disaster will bring happiness to them. Especially when they receive help, we will see their eyes filled with gratitude and gratitude.Your little help can lighten their load.Thank you irfan_pak10 for this initiative.
